solution_line_template: Being {helen_taller_than_amy} cm taller than Amy, Helen's height is {amy_height} + {helen_taller_than_amy} = <<{amy_height}+{helen_taller_than_amy}={helen_height}>>{helen_height} cm.

Being {angela_taller_than_helen} cm taller than Helen, Angela's height is {helen_height} + {angela_taller_than_helen} = <<{helen_height}+{angela_taller_than_helen}={angela_height}>>{angela_height} cm.
